sections.instructor: Knight, Lynn Knight, Prerequisite: Placement as determined by the college's multiple measures assessment process or completion of a course taught at or above the level of intermediate algebra. Advisory: High school geometry or equivalent Note: Partially online course. In addition to online instruction, this class has mandatory in-person meetings from 10:00-12:00pm on Saturdays 3/15, 4/26 (exams) and 5/17 (final exam.) All other instruction provided online through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to locate course.
